Needs 5 Ratings

Adam Ahani (2012)

1h 24min | Comedy, Drama, Family | 1 February 2012 (Iran)
A 12 year old boy mixes up the reality and the adventure of the computer gaming into an unpleasant life style. His parents are not aware of the situation and the problem gets worse and worst.

Director:

Rahim Behboodi Far

Writer:

Rahim Behboodi Far

Stars:

Ahmadreza Asadi, Hooman Barghnavard, Ahmad Alameh Dahr | See full cast & crew »
